EmailTemplate.description: Letter to parents about keeping children safe in the high summer
EmailTemplate.name: Sun Smart Letter
EmailTemplate.subject: Sun Smart letter
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
The British School of Tashkent Part of The British Schools Group
Dear {!Contact.Salutation} {!Contact.FirstName} {!Contact.LastName},
Please find attached letter about the importance of taking sensible precautions to stay safe in the sun.
Уважаемые родители,
В прикрепленном файле Вы найдете письмо о том как важно принимать меры предосторожности защиты от солнца.
Regards,
Administration Team The British School of Tashkent World Class Education
__________________________________________________________ Beijing - Kuala Lumpur - Sao Paulo - Manila - Moscow - Guangzhou - Nanjing - Tashkent - Pamplona -Marbella
